about.subTitle: I'm currently a software engineer at DotDigital, where I channel my passion for problem-solving and innovation into every project. I thrive on leveraging cloud infrastructure, Django skills, and React with Typescript skills, effective solutions that boost performance, simplify maintenance, and enhance user experience.

section1.title: Soft Skills That Pay the Bills
section1.copy: Beyond technical prowess, I bring strong leadership, time management, and multitasking skills—refined through my experiences as a business owner. Outside work, I stay active through gymming and basketball, which energize my creativity and drive. I’m confident my well-rounded abilities will add real value to every project.

section2.title: Research and Planning
section2.copy: I find immense satisfaction in the planning and architecture phases of projects. Whether designing comprehensive design systems or crafting innovative brand strategies, I relish exploring every facet of user experience to build solid, future-proof solutions.
